package.name: Minotaur
package.shortDescription: Status bar notifications for your machine

descriptionlist.description:
Minotaur gives easy access to notifications from anywhere in the system and applications. For those who remember the old Confero tweak, Minotaur is a modernized and adapted version for iOS13.
Supports all iOS13 devices, whether old or new iPhones or iPads.
Thanks to all sorts of customization options, Minotaur will fit into any custom system design without any rejection. - Dark and light theme. - Adaptive painting of badges. - Ability to hide notification banners. - Works great with ColorBadges and ColorBanners. - Ability to replace the location icon when the Minotaur icon is active.
